entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Hello World!

Hey, we’re online!

This is our new site, built with Jekyll and markdown, it can do a lot of clever stuff, while still being really simple:

  • RSS Feeds
  • Blog posts
  • Regular pages
  • PDF files
  • Bullet lists … haha
